Package org.streamexperiments.producer.integration.kafka

Class KafkaProducerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streamexperiments.producer.integration.kafka.KafkaProducerConfiguration
  • @Configuration
@ConditionalOnProperty(value="kafka.enabled",
                       havingValue="true")
public class KafkaProducerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Gathers the integration stuff related to Kafka messaging, conditionally loaded depending on kafka.enabled property. If that property is set to "true" the configuration will be loaded, otherwise it will not. Notice the integration stuff is abstracted behind Gateway to which an extension in provided here with KafkaProducerConfiguration.Gateway

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  KafkaProducerConfiguration.Gateway
      Extension of Gatewayr related to Kafka messaging.
